news_header: Citycon's CEO Henrica Ginström resigns immediately.
news_text: Henrica Ginström, the CEO of the shopping center-focused real estate company Citycon, has resigned immediately, as announced in a company statement. Citycon and Ginström have mutually agreed on her departure. The company issued a profit warning on Monday evening. The board has appointed F. Scott Ball, the vice-chairman of Citycon's board, as the interim CEO. Ball previously served as Citycon's CEO from 2019 to 2024 and will continue as a board member. Citycon has initiated the search for a new CEO. Ginström had been in the role since last April.
